you_have_declined_to_be_digitally_author: You have declined to be digitally authorised to file online for
what_happens_now_youve_declined: What happens now you’ve declined to be digitally authorised
weve_sent_an_email: We’ve sent an email to the company’s registered email address and to any other people who are digitally authorised. We’ve let them know you’ve declined to be digitally authorised to file for this company.
